form_for.body:
<%= form_for ${1} do |f| %>
  ${2:<%= render "shared/errors" %>}
  ${3:<%= f.text_field :${4:field_1}, class: "${5:form-control}" %>}
  ${6}
<% end %>

form_tag.body:
<%= form_tag ${1:submission_path}, method: :${2:get}, class: "navbar-form navbar-left search-form" do %>
  <%= text_field_tag(
      :${3:search},
      params[:${3:search}],
      placeholder: "Search",
      class: "form-control"
  ) %>
<% end %>

select_field.body:
<%= f.select(
    :${1:resource_id},
    options_from_collection_for_select(
      @${2:collection},
      :${3:id},
      :${4:name},
      @${5:form_object}.${1:resource_id}
    ),
    {
      include_blank: "${6:Please select one}"
    },
    { class: "${7:form-control}" }
) %>$8

select_tag.body:
<%= select_tag(
  :${1:color_id},
  options_from_collection_for_select(
    @${2:colors},
    :${3:id},
    :${4:name},
    params[:${1:color_id}]
  ),
  {
    include_blank: "Please select one"
  },
  { class: "${5:form-control}" }
) %> $0
